name: Breath of the Dragon
summary: You can use a powerful breath weapon, much like the dragon you emulate.
description:
You can use a powerful breath weapon, much like the dragon you emulate. You gain the dragon breath sorcerer bloodline spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. If you already have a focus pool, increase your number of Focus Points by 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
